Whether you're going on a hiking or camping trip, or heading out on a road trip, our first aid kit will be there to provide you with the essential medical supplies you need in case of emergencies. Inside the first aid kit, you'll find a variety of emergency items such as bandages, gauze, scissors, and more. All of our first aid supplies are rigorously tested to ensure that they meet the high standards of quality and safety.

COMPREHENSIVE CARE: With its comprehensive and varieties of medical supplies, this first aid kit is a great ideal for families, office, camping, hiking, boating, car, sports, travel, road trips, workplace, school. Whether you're at home or outdoors, this mini medical kit is the perfect choice for anyone who wants to be ready for anything.

OUR SERVICE: We commit to impress every customer with high quality products and service. If you meet any problem with this first aid kits, please feel free to contact us and trust that we will do it right.

A first aid kit should be compact, lightweight, and easy to carry. It has a sturdy case that protects the contents from damage and keeps them organized. Contains 120 pieces of premium first aid supplies Premium EVA waterproof material Suitable size & easy to carry Compact & well-organized Carabiner design - Can be easily attached to your backpack Comprehensive - contain a variety of medical supplies such as adhesive bandages, gauze pads, cleaning wipes, and basic medical tools like scissors and tweezers.

What is the expiration date of the contents of this first aid kit? This first aid kit contains 120 pieces of first aid items, and each item has a different expiration date. Some items have a 5-year expiration, while others have a 3-year expiration. These dates are printed on the packaging of each individual item. It is important to check the expiration dates regularly and replace any expired items in your first aid kit to ensure that the contents remain effective and safe to use in case of an emergency. What is the size of this survival kit case? Is it easy to carry and store? The dimensions of this first aid kit are 6.3"x4.7"x2.3" (16x12x6cm), and it weighs 0.62 lbs (283g). Our intention in designing this kit is to create a portable and easy-to-store medical kit. How's the quality of the first aid supplies? Is the bag waterproof? This first aid bag is made from high-quality waterproof EVA material. The components inside have been carefully selected to ensure they are of excellent quality and reliability. We take responsibility for our customers. Is there really 120 pieces in this medical kit? This first aid kit contains a total of 120 pieces of first aid supplies, covering 24 different types. Please refer to the accessory table above for detailed information on the first aid supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini First Aid Kit
reviews.reviewText: Because it contains 120 individual items, it provides comprehensive coverage of all the fundamentals required for treating small wounds and accidents. This makes it useful for use in a variety of contexts, including but not limited to the home, the workplace, travel, and other types of outdoor activities. This pack contains everything I need to treat a minor injury, such as a headache, a blister, or a little cut. This first aid kit stands out from others because it has a sturdy casing, which distinguishes it from other options that are more flimsy. Because of its sturdy and waterproof design, it is suitable for use during outdoor activities as well as when traveling since it protects the medical supplies within. It is the ideal size for the glove box of my vehicle, my bag, or even my purse, allowing me to have it close at hand at all times in case I ever need it. The organization that is included in the kit is flawless. The many compartments and separators preserve the goods in their proper places, preventing them from being mixed up or damaged while they are being transported. In addition to this, it has labeled pockets, which make it simple to find the appropriate item even when time is of the essence. This set has come in handy for me on many different occasions, and each time it has shown why it is so valuable. My ankle sprained somewhat when I was out hiking and using the quick cold pack brought me rapid relief from the pain. In a different incident, a friend of mine had a minor burn while cooking, and the burn ointment and bandage came to her rescue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the car
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for traveling. Fits perfectly in my purse, glove box of the car, and has come in handy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good basic FA Kit
reviews.reviewText: Replace the scissors with emt shears. Throw out and replace the useless tweezers with something more substantial. And you will have a pretty good little kit.

reviews.reviewText: Great kit to keep in the suitcase when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works well. I would purchase another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: Great for travel. Compact & full of your basic necessities.Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product to throw in my hiking hydration pack. It’s a little bulbous, but seems to be well made.I picked this one for the price and the list of supplies. I live in Florida where a nice morning hike could end in peril. We have so many plants and animal life that want nothing more than to attack humans any chance they get. I also take This with me to my son’s little league games as well, because we have seen a lot of injuries over the years. Mostly during practice when there isn’t a concession area to ask for help.Also, I appreciate the color and the style of case, because it is easy to see in a dark backpack. The firmness of the case is a nice touch as well, because I do not feel like it will be crushed. I have taken it out on a few trips and it looks good as new.“I’d rather have it and not need it, than need it and not have it” - some wise old man

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 46 of 120-pieces are bandages
reviews.reviewText: This First Aid kit has 120 pieces tightly packaged within the hard shell, so tight that once I removed all the items for inspection, I couldn't fit them all back in together.note: of the 120 pieces, 46 are bandages.The hard shell feels smooth to the touch and is a bit flexible (not rigid).I like that the gauze pads are in individual packages, as this keeps them clean until I need to use it.I put a bandage on the back of my hand, and one on my knuckle. The bandage stuck better to my hand, while the edges of the bandage started peeling away from my knuckle after a couple of hours.note: there is only one 2"x4" bandage, but lots of 3/4" x 2-1/5" bandages.The gloves are thin; but, they fit my small sized hands well.The product description page says that this is a "...waterproof hard shell...".When I closed this case, even with the two zippers right near each other, there is still a tiny gap where water could enter (see pic where I wrote "gap").Overall, I find this First Aid Kit to be somewhat adequate, with too many adhesive plasters (bandages), only 1 gauze roll, 1 eye wash, 1 burn cream and just a few gauze pads.
Kit came COMPLETELY EMPTY. same for my friend that ordered same one. Just comes with bag for $30
